selected_quotes: Nurses have fundamental knowledge of #healthcaredelivery... policymaking suffers w/o this knowledge. Great read!

citation.abstract:
The article includes a review of selected past and current leadership initiatives as well as a summary of three leadership meetings convened by The Center to Champion Nursing in America, a partnership of the Robert Wood Johnson Foundation (RWJF), AARP and the AARP Foundation.
These "Leadership in Action" meetings were designed to address the Campaign for Action's (CFA) goal to increase the number of nurse leaders in health- and health care-related boardrooms at the local, state and national levels.
RWJF supported key nursing organizations in initial discussions around integrating state and national efforts to get more nurses onto boards leading to a active vibrant coalition making significant progress.
This article concludes with a call to action encouraging all nurses to consider board service as an essential component of improving health and health care and to do their part to help build a Culture of Health in the United States.
citation.title: Nurses Leading Change to Advance Health

author.name: Roberto Rivera-Olmo
author.description: Progressive Care Nurse in Intermediate Step-down Unit, Graduate Nursing Student, Nursing & Healthcare Activist, Nurse Ambassador

author.name: Jacqueline Nikpour
author.description: BSN, RN. @PennNursing alumna. Former @ibxfdn & @RWJF intern. Advocate for #NurseLeadership, #HealthEquity #SocialInnovation & disease prevention.
